text: @NYGovCuomo Gov. Cuomo, why did you publish the policy to return COVID-19 positive elderly patients back to nursing homes? You had USNS COMFORT and the Javits Center as resources for COVID-19 patients. Why did you send them back to infect others and die without dignity?
